glossary.title: Active Participants
glossary.description: The number of active participants you had last year in this customer segment

glossary.title: Allocated FC Days
glossary.description: The number of FC days you will allocate to this customer segment this year

glossary.title: Average Contribution
glossary.description: The average dollar amount that active participants contribute to their retirement plan on an annual basis in this customer segment

glossary.title: Average Fees
glossary.description: The average fees you are charging in this customer segment, relative to the market

glossary.title: Benefits
glossary.description: Expense; benefit payments for retirement services insurance and annuities, and retirement services interest credited to policy

glossary.title: Client Operating Results
glossary.description: Controllable revenue (fees) minus your direct expenses

glossary.title: Committed FC Days
glossary.description: The number of contractual FC days you are commited to this year in this customer segment

glossary.title: Contribution Growth
glossary.description: Forecast the percentage of participant contribution growth you are expecting this year in this customer segment; to create an accurate forecast, reference the average annual participant contribution in this customer segment

glossary.title: Corporate Initiatives
glossary.description: Strategic initatives on the corporate level spanning across the organization that you support

glossary.title: Cross-Sell Capability
glossary.description: Includes non-retirement institutional sales (E&F, Retiree Health and other parts of the Institutional offer) and referrals into retail business

glossary.title: Customer Satisfaction
glossary.description: Plan Sponsor NPS survey results in operational and relationship satisfaction

glossary.title: D&I Representation Index
glossary.description: Percentage of employees who are diverse; provides a target to maintain and strengthen workforce diversity

glossary.title: Direct Expenses
glossary.description: Expenses; costs that can be directly attributed to customer and/or participant acquisition and services

glossary.title: Employee Efficiency
glossary.description: Measure of your employees productivity and collaboration; NPS of your employees

glossary.title: Estimated FC Days Required
glossary.description: The estimated number of FC days required this year in this customer segment; this number is based on the total number of active participants and the estimated amount of time needed per participant

glossary.title: Fee Revenue
glossary.description: Revenue; fees charged to customers and/or active participants for recordkeeping and proprietary fund management

glossary.title: Focus Area
glossary.description: The important roles and responsibilities that RMs, CSMs, and FCs spend time doing, in addition to their typical every day administrative tasks

glossary.title: Forecasted Active Participants
glossary.description: The number of active participants you are expecting this year in this customer segment; this number is based on the number of active participants you had last year and the percentage growth you are forecasting this year in this customer segment

glossary.title: Forecasted Contribution
glossary.description: The average annual participant contribution you are expecting in this customer segment; this number is based on last year's average annual participant contribution and the percentage of participant contribution growth you are forecasting this year in this customer segment

glossary.title: Forecasted Revenue
glossary.description: The forecasted total AUM you are expecting this year in this customer segment; this number is based on the number of active participants in this segment and the average fees they are charged

glossary.title: Forecasted Revenue Growth
glossary.description: The forecasted revenue growth you are expecting this year in this customer segment; this percentage represents your forecasted total share of participants and the average fees they are charged

glossary.title: IR Business Planning/ Efficiency Index
glossary.description: A composite score taking into account the accuracy of the inventory of all business risks and the data captured in Archer, and whether the appropriate controls, KRIâ€™s and mitigation are in place

glossary.title: Mappable Sales
glossary.description: AUM mapped to an organization from another organization, typically the result of winning sole record-keeper and participant's assets transferring over from a previous plan provider

glossary.title: Net Flows
glossary.description: Total inflows minus total outflows

glossary.title: Net Margin
glossary.description: Net profit divided by fee revenue

glossary.title: Net New Entrants
glossary.description: Participant attrition + new participants - churned participants

glossary.title: Net Profit
glossary.description: Fee revenue minus benefits and direct expenses

glossary.title: Non-Retirement Institutional Sales
glossary.description: Developing pipelines and growing E&F, Retiree Health and other parts of the Institutional offer

glossary.title: Operational Expenses
glossary.description: Operational KPIs specifically related to driving non-retirement institutional sales (i.e. Cross-Sell Index) and incentivizing retention (i.e. Net New Entrants)

glossary.title: Participant Growth
glossary.description: Forecast the percentage of participant growth you are expecting this year in this customer segment; to create an accuate forecast, reference the number of active participants you had last year in this customer segment

glossary.title: Participant New Assets
glossary.description: Field Consultant Sales Referrals

glossary.title: Participant Satisfaction
glossary.description: Participant NPS survey results from individual participants

glossary.title: Potential Participants
glossary.description: The number of potential participants you can provide service to this year in this customer segment; this number is based on the number of non-active participants and the participant churn

glossary.title: Risk Management Index
glossary.description: Risk Management is a Pass/Fail Metric to drive awareness/engagement on topics of risk identified in the business

glossary.title: Share Of Participants
glossary.description: The percentage of participants you are expecting to capture within the potential participant base this year in this customer segment

glossary.title: Simplicity Index
glossary.description: Rating of ease to do business within IRB Lines of Business

glossary.title: Strategy
glossary.description: Strategy helps a company to achieve its goals; a good strategy takes into account the company's current competitive situation and available resources and capabilities

glossary.title: Strategy Alignment
glossary.description: When the Visions and goals are aligned at different levels of an organization, alignment of strategies is more likely to occur

glossary.title: Strategy Implementation
glossary.description: Strategic implementation occurs when the vision, goals and strategy at various levels of the organization have been aligned

glossary.title: SWOT Analysis
glossary.description: An analysis framework that examines a company's strengths and weaknesses internally, as well as external opportunities and threats

glossary.title: Total Budget Remaining
glossary.description: The dollar amount left remaining in your annual expense budget

glossary.title: Total Inflows
glossary.description: AUM; this shows all actual in-year increases to assets under management

glossary.title: Total Outflows
glossary.description: AUM; this shows all actual in-year decreases to assets under management

glossary.title: Utilization
glossary.description: The utilization percentage, by role, this year across the territory (all customer groups); this percentage represents the time spent utilized, factoring in productivity and this percentage includes baseline time spent on administrative tasks, as well as the time spent on focus areas, events, etc.
